DOC.brief_summary: The Study multi-center , prospective , open label , single-arm , three-month , long-term study Attune Sleep Apnea System treatment obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) . The objective study monitor long-term use Attune Sleep Apnea System .
DOC.criteria: Subject participate ATLAST Study , complete 28day takehome period Subject understand Study protocol willing able comply Study requirement sign inform consent form . The study physician investigator believe study participation appropriate subject . Subject least one molar four quadrant mouth ( right upper , right low , leave upper , leave low ) . Female subject pregnant intend become pregnant study period . Poor nasal patency evidence inability breathe nose mouth close . Oral cavity infection oral dental condition problem would limit subject use Attune Sleep Apnea System History OSA surgical treatment
